name: Waking Nightmares (kurjamaa.katriin)
description: There is a boy who is a trap in his nightmares/depression, he is looking his way out. Find the way out by collecting some objects and those objects are his good memory/happiness. The game is gonna be black and white as first by collecting the object it will give some colors. Every object he collects it brings back colors. You have to collect all 5 objects to finished the game.
